title: Join us soon for the World Championships of Warhammer Preview

author: Warhammer
description:
The Helsmiths of Hashut have lots of awesome skin tones, some even closely resembling stone or rock! Seeing as they’re quite different to the skin tones that we normally see on miniatures, these might throw you off. But if that’s the case, not to worry! Ollie’s here to show you three different Helsmiths of Hashut skin tones, all achievable with just three paints. 

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Skin Tone One

Base:
Rakarth Flesh

Contrast:
Guilliman Flesh

Layer:
Baneblade Brown

Skin Tone Two

Layer:
Skavenblight Dinge
Stormvermin Fur

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Skin Tone Three

Base:
Corax White

Shade:
Targor Rageshade

Layer:
Pallid Wych Flesh

Tools:
M Base
M Shade
S Dry

Technical:
Lahmian Medium

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerof
title: Helsmiths of Hashut Skin Tones | Warhammer Age of Sigmar
